action.thought_process: I'm feeling stressed and tired, and I need to focus on my work. The environment is distracting, but I can try to minimize the distractions. Since I had coffee recently, another cup might not be the best idea. I should try to refocus and work for another hour, then head home to get some rest. I will put on my noise cancelling headphones to block out the noise.
action.emotional_update: Slightly stressed and tired, but also somewhat distracted and contemplative about work-life balance.
action.action: Refocus on work and use noise-canceling headphones.

action_details.manner: Put on noise-canceling headphones and close unnecessary tabs on my laptop to minimize distractions. Set a timer for one hour to work on the project.
